XIII.ii.3.B.1.e
.
When to Furnish Information to ARC or a Tax-Supported Social Agency
VA will supply an American Red Cross (ARC) chapter or other tax-supported social agency the necessary medical and social data for confidential use, when requested, for the purpose of implementing the provisions in the
Veterans Health Administration (VHA) Handbook 1110.04, Case Management Standards of Practice
.
title: M21-1, Part XIII, Subpart ii, Chapter 3, Section B - Requests from Public Assistance Agencies
